diagnosis.description: The diagnosis made in this interpretation

disease.description: The disease/condition assigned to the diagnosis.Details about this disease may be contained in the `diseases` field in the Phenopacket.

id.description: a CURIE-style identifier e.g. HP:0100024, MP:0001284, UBERON:0001690. This is the primary key for the ontology class REQUIRED!

label.description: class label, aka name. E.g. "Abnormality of cardiovascular system"

OntologyClass.title: Ontology Class
OntologyClass.description: A class (aka term, concept) in an ontology. FHIR mapping: CodeableConcept (http://www.hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html#CodeableConcept). See also Coding (http://www.hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html#Coding).
